member.name: M:Simple.WebSockets.Shared.Helpers.Utilities.GenerateDataSize(System.Double)
member.summary: Generate data size string. Will return a pretty string of bytes, KiB, MiB, GiB, TiB based on the given bytes.

member.name: M:Simple.WebSockets.Shared.Helpers.Utilities.GenerateTimePeriod(System.Double)
member.summary: Generate time period string. Will return a pretty string of ns, mcs, ms, s, m, h based on the given nanoseconds.

member.name: M:Simple.WebSockets.Shared.Helpers.Utilities.GenerateIdentifier(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a unique identifier using a customised "ShortGuid"

member.name: M:Simple.WebSockets.Shared.Helpers.Utilities.ToShortGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Converts from a to a ShortGuid
